languages.text: "Обсуждения — прекратить, услышанное — забыть. Сейчас я приму доклад и удалюсь в изгнание на палубу 18-Эст. Похоже, только там я теперь смогу обрести покой".

"There will be no further discussion of this incident. Forget everything you heard. I will receive the report and exile myself to Deck 18-Est. It seems to be the only place where I can find peace now."
languages.original_text: "Обсуждения — прекратить, услышанное — забыть. Сейчас я приму доклад и удалюсь в изгнание на палубу 18-Эст. Похоже, только там я теперь смогу обрести покой".

traits.locale_text: "End the discussions. Forget everything you heard. I will now take the report and retire to deck 17-Est in exile. It seems to be the only place where I can find peace now."
"End the discussions. Forget everything you heard. I will now take the report and retire to deck 17-Est in exile. It seems to be the only place where I can find peace now."
"No more discussing this. Forget everything you heard. I will exile myself to deck 17-Est with the report. It seems to be the only place where I can find peace now."
"No more discussing this. Forget everything you heard. I will exile myself to deck 17-Est with the report. It seems to be the only place where I can find peace now."

"There will be no further discussion of this incident. Forget everything you heard. I will receive the report and exile myself to Deck 18-Est. It seems to be the only place where I can find peace now."

"There will be no further discussion of this incident. Forget everything you heard. I will receive the report and exile myself to Deck 18-Est. It seems to be the only place where I can find peace now."

languages.text: « N'en parlons plus, l'incident est clos. Oubliez ce que vous avez entendu. Je vais m'isoler sur le pont 18-Est avec ce rapport. Il semble que ce soit le seul endroit où je puisse avoir la paix, maintenant... »
languages.original_text: "There will be no further discussion of this incident. Forget everything you heard. I will receive the report and exile myself to Deck 18-Est. It seems to be the only place where I can find peace now."

traits.locale_text: « N'en parlons plus et oubliez ce que vous avez entendu. Je vais m'isoler sur le pont 17-Est avec ce rapport. Il semble que ce soit le seul endroit où je puisse avoir la paix, maintenant... »

languages.text: “这件事情不准再讨论了，把你们听到的一切都给我忘了。我打算看一下报告，之后一个人去东十八号甲板上待一会儿，恐怕只有那里能让我耳根清净一下。”
languages.original_text: "There will be no further discussion of this incident. Forget everything you heard. I will receive the report and exile myself to Deck 18-Est. It seems to be the only place where I can find peace now."

traits.locale_text: “这种事情不准再讨论了，把你们听到的一切都给我忘了。我要一个人带着报告去东十八号甲板上待一会儿，恐怕只有那里能让我耳根清净些。”

languages.text: "Es wird keine weiteren Diskussionen über diesen Zwischenfall geben. Vergesst alles, was Ihr gehört habt. Ich werde mich mit dem Bericht auf Deck 18-Est zurückziehen. Das ist inzwischen wohl der einzige Ort, wo ich noch Frieden finden kann."
languages.original_text: "There will be no further discussion of this incident. Forget everything you heard. I will receive the report and exile myself to Deck 18-Est. It seems to be the only place where I can find peace now."

traits.locale_text: "Kein Wort mehr darüber. Vergesst alles, was Ihr gehört habt. Ich schließe mich mit dem Bericht auf Deck 17-Est ein. Das ist inzwischen wohl der einzige Ort, wo ich noch Frieden finden kann."

languages.text: «No hablaremos más de esto. Olvide todo lo que ha oído. Recibiré el informe y me retiraré a la cubierta 18-Est. Creo que es el único lugar donde podré estar en paz ahora mismo».
languages.original_text: "There will be no further discussion of this incident. Forget everything you heard. I will receive the report and exile myself to Deck 18-Est. It seems to be the only place where I can find peace now."

traits.locale_text: «No hablaremos más de esto. Olvide todo lo que ha oído. Me retiraré al puente 17-Est con el informe. Creo que es el único lugar donde podré estar en paz ahora mismo».

languages.text: 「今回の件についてこれ以上の議論は無駄だ。聞いたことはすべて忘れろ。{mf|俺|私}は報告書を受け取って、18-Estデッキに消えるとしよう。今はそこしか安全な場所はないようだ」
languages.original_text: "There will be no further discussion of this incident. Forget everything you heard. I will receive the report and exile myself to Deck 18-Est. It seems to be the only place where I can find peace now."

traits.locale_text: 「今回の件についてこれ以上の議論は無駄だ。聞いたことはすべて忘れろ。{mf|俺|私}は報告書を受け取って、18-Estデッキに消えるとしよう。今はそこしか安全な場所はないようだ」

languages.text: "Bir daha bu olaydan söz edilmeyecek. Duyduğunuz her şeyi unutun. Raporu dinleyecek ve 18. Doğu Güvertesi'ne çekileceğim. Anlaşılan bana bir tek orada huzur var."
languages.original_text: "There will be no further discussion of this incident. Forget everything you heard. I will receive the report and exile myself to Deck 18-Est. It seems to be the only place where I can find peace now."

traits.locale_text: "Bir daha bu olaydan söz edilmeyecek. Duyduğunuz her şeyi unutun. Raporu dinleyeceğim ve Doğu Güvertesi 18'e çekileceğim. Görünüşe göre tek huzur bulabileceğim yer artık orası."
